review_title: Very good quality, very good price!
reviews:
This product fits well, is super comfortable to wear and washes well. It did not shrink or pill in the wash. I am very happy with this sweater because it is such a low cost, and it is such good quality. This is the second one I purchased and I will probably purchase more because they are such a good price and a perfect sweater to have for Canada winter. I wear them to my office because I’m an engineer and don’t have a dress policy at my office, so I wear jeans and a sweater because it’s comfortable. I would recommend this product!

edit: After a few days a hole opened up in the seem on the arm. I have two of these sweaters and one is fine. But the other has a hole. I would still recommend this product because it is so low cost, and the sweaters are still great. I use this from morning jogs mainly now, which they work fine for. If you have the money, I would buy more expensive better quality sweater because they would last longer, but for the money, this is a good sweater and is completely worth the cost.

------********Please click the helpful button if you found my review helpful :) Thank you**********-------

rank:

#5 in Men's Sweatshirts

reviews:
I bought the XL for an oversized fit. I'm 200lbs, curv structured (female) and this is so roomy, bright and soft. Everything I hoped for when ordering.

I bought these for my husband (170lbs-6ft tall) that goes for work at 4am daily, he absolutely loves these and how warm they are without having to wear a standard hoodie.

However I feel like these can also be perfect for all the women searching for oversized sweaters for fashion (ie me) - thus why I am including photos of myself wearing it. It's literally perfect.

My only con is I'm throwing my money at them now for more colours!!

reviews: I bought this for my Dad who is a little on the short side in stature and typically has probably finding sweatshirts that don't fit like a dress. I had him check his closet to a brand name on his only existing sweatshirt that fits him. It was Fruit of the Loom, hence my purchase. I bought two in different colors and had them shipped directly to him, while keeping my fingers crossed. Long story short, he loves them! Perfect fit! Now every time I video call with him he is wearing one or the other of these sweatshirts!
product_name: Hanes ComfortBlend EcoSmart Pullover Hoodie Sweatshirt
rank:
#80 in Clothing & Accessories (See Top 100 in Clothing & Accessories)
#4 in Men's Hoodies
#5 in Men's Sweatshirts

reviews:
A well made, light weight sweat shirt. The material was lighter than I am used too but this turned out to be an advantage. I practically live in sweatshirts and I found that indoors with moderate activity my old heavier sweats were too hot. I know I know... they call then sweatshirts for a reason? :P With these sweats I find I can wear them more often in different activities.
If you are looking for something warmer, I would suggest going for a heavier weight sweatshirt.
